install.name: Ulti RPX
install.author: Ulti Joomla
install.description:
Plugin for the Ulti RPX extension
Plugin website: Ulti Joomla

param.name: usecurl
param.label: Use curl library
param.description: The best option is to u se the php curl library. If for some reason you can not install this on your web server, then you need to switch this off. I n this case you need to switch on the php parameter allow_url_fopen, which is not adviceable due to possible security issues .

param.name: fakemail
param.label: Use dummy mail
param.description: Use a dummy mail address for the users that login with RPX. Some community sites like facebook don't reveil the mail address of the user. In this case Ulti RPX will create a dummy (non-existing) address. If this option is switched on, it will create dummy addresses even if a real mail address is available.
